- Supported on Linux , Mac and Windows
- SQLite , PostgreSQL , MySQL(MariaDB)

posts.caption: msdn.microsoft.com
posts.description: The .NET Compiler Platform ("Roslyn") provides open-source C# and Visual Basic compilers with rich code analysis APIs. You can build code analysis tools with the same APIs that Microsoft is using to implement Visual Studio!
